    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2247</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Greenhouse gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewächshausgase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gaz de serre chaude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gáses da estufa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gas della serra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αέρια θερμοκηπίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gases del invernadero</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An explanation of the creation of greenhouse gases and the role they play in the atmosphere</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">green house gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atmosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Erklärung der Kreation der Gewächshausgase
und die Rolle, die sie in der Atmosphäre spielen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une explication de la création des gaz de serre 
chaude et le rôle qu'ils jouent dans l'atmosphère</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma explanação da criação de gáses da estufa
e o papel que jogam na atmosfera</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una spiegazione della creazione dei gas della 
serra ed il ruolo che svolgono nell'atmosfera</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια εξήγηση της δημιουργίας των αερίων θερμοκηπίου και
ο ρόλος παίζουν στην ατμόσφαιρα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una explicación de la creación de los gases del
invernadero y el papel que desempeñan en la atmósfera</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">grüne Hausgase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atmosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gaz verts de maison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'atmosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gáses verdes da casa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atmosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gas verdi della casa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">atmosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πράσινα αέρια σπιτιών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ατμόσφαιρα</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gases verdes de la casa</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">atmósfera</string>
          </keyword>
